snippet: On three Saturdays in August, a five-mile stretch of the city -- and a zip line in Foley Square -- will be open to New Yorkers as part of Summer Streets.
abstract: On three Saturdays in August, a five-mile stretch of the city -- and a zip line in Foley Square -- will be open to New Yorkers as part of Summer Streets.

headline.main: A Time to Take Over the Streets, or Soar Above Them
